name: Number of the century by year
instruction:
Write a function `century` that takes a positive integer `year` - the number of the year
as a parameter and returns the number of the century.

Examples of function calls:
```javascript
century(1900) // 19
century(1901) // 20
century(2000) // 20
century(2001) // 21
```

In the solution, `Math.ceil()` will come in handy.
